attributes.title: horrendous
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible. As soon as I entered the app my entire phone glitched out and my instagram account was HACKED. I logged in to find my entire account had been DESTROYED and all of my posts were gone. Instead of my posts, there were pictures of trump. This campaign is a CULT. No thanks

attributes.title: Just no🤮
attributes.review: When I got this app it was just terrifying. After I got the app everything in my house started to turn orange screaming “Trump 2020”.😈😈👺👹👹 Then my dog started throwing up Cheetos puffs that also said “trump 2020”. If you are thinking of getting this app then be prepared to see some messed up demonic this happen to u house. BE CAREFUL!!

attributes.title: this app...
attributes.review: i was hoping to get some cool merch on here but when i put all my information in it all went downhill...i was hacked and they used my email and phone number for spam mail. Now i get emails and phone call 5 times a day for uti treatment, very disappointed.

attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♂️✨✨🧚🏼‍♂️😍🥰😘
attributes.review: I felt so traumatized I kept seeing a rotten orange 🍊 I this app gave me glitches and I just can’t with this app it would be so sad If it 🧚🏼‍♂️✨✨❤️ SHUT DOWN✨🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️😍😍🥰😘I also had to 👺 sacrifice my poor pet caterpillar👁👁 because the app told me to sacrifice him for a dusted Cheeto 😫 this app is horrible🤡 pls don’t download it 👁👁 for your own sake 👁👄👁

attributes.title: This app is trash.
attributes.review: I had downloaded this app , and it was taking a while to load. It took 3 to 5 minutes. Then when it did load , it showed me very inappropriate pictures. Also , racist words were coming across my screen.

attributes.title: This app murdered my pet cockroach 🤬🤬
attributes.review: I originally downloaded this app to support my favorite racist rapist president, but then the app malfunctioned and a huge orange person erupted from my phone screen and squashed my poor cockroach. I wish I could give this app 0 stars. -4 out of 10, would never recommend 🤬

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: When I opened the app I instantly knew that I had made the worst mistake of my life. Disturbing images and slogans flashed across my screen. I could practically hear everyone donald trump has hurt screaming. The app also hacked my phone and changed all my wallpapers and my app covers and photos to trump. 🤢

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

if i could give it zero stars i would. horrible disgusting worst app ever glitches every were i step i hate this app get it off the app store i paid money on it and it stole alll of my money i have 1200 in my credit card and when i used it to buy a 10 dollar thing is STOLE ALL MY

attributes.title: Little cheeto man is upsetting me
attributes.review: so i would actually love to report back to apple that this app is horrid and deserves to be taken off of your services.😤 This angry, racist, pedo, cheeto man greeeted me as i opened the app. im very disappointed to say his presence was not pleasant. he made me feel very unsafe in my country, i would much rarher have a democrat in office.👁👄👁
